EasyJournal - An app by Adam Steel.

EasyJournal is the journal app that works like a chat app. Just send your thoughts like a message. 

Your information is yours - it's kept on your device (backup features coming soon).
Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

Welcome to EasyJournal - the simplest journalling app there is!

 Use EasyJournal like a chat app - no creating new entries or saving to worry about.
 Your thoughts are a continuous stream, so that's how we store them.
 Just enter your thoughts naturally, one by one.

 To delete an entry, long press it.

 Backup\transfer features coming soon!
